blog.name: sunshineyou27
blog.title: Hello Sunshine
blog.description: Maxence Danet Fauvel is my lovely sunshine ❤

summary: About The Last Clip
body:
About The Last Clip

I saw many people disappointed about the last clip. I’m just saying, it’s not anyone’s fault. To whom are you angry and disappointed? David and Niels never said this and that would happen.

We are the ones who make the story in our head and imagine, assume and draw conclusions. One person spreads their imagination, others see and participate in spreading. The more imagination and assumptions spread, the higher our expectations for it to become a reality. But what happened was not what we imagined. And we start to be disappointed, angry and sad. For what and for whom? for the imagination we make is too high.

There is nothing wrong with imagining and assuming. Do it. But what we have to learn is not to depend too much on the imagination and assumptions that we make, so that we will not fall down feeling so deeply disappointed. We cannot blame others, ourselves make our hopes too high. Our self control of the imagination that we build is too high, which in reality is not necessarily happening.

Dear my friend … Don’t take things too seriously. Let everything go … life isn’t always filled with smiles, because if life is only about happiness, how do you know what happiness means.

summary: So, Eliott only attends school on fridays an sometimes thursday but only when he has to give back a scarf lol, no, seriously......
question: So, Eliott only attends school on fridays an sometimes thursday but only when he has to give back a scarf lol, no, seriously... I assume he's not doing well atm, bc otherwise he would have been there or at least sent a text. But it doesn't help the progess of them falling in love (imo), at least not from what we know/expect so far. Maybe they'll kiss on friday but I don't know how they would potray that believable now? Maybe we have to be patient for it to fall in the right places. I dont know.
answer:
Yep, anon. At this point, I’m gonna wait it out, and see what happens. We may get another clip tomorrow yet, and that could answer some of our questions. Or maybe the Friday clips will.

It’s Skam, one clip can change everything.

reblog.comment:

It’s Skam, one clip can change everything.

blog.name: smores100
blog.title: Life's a bitch until you die
blog.description: Skam will forever own my heart. Other likes: SkamNl and Druck, Shadowhunters, B99, TGP, Timothee Chalamet, Darren Criss, Gal Gadot, Tom Hardy etc. Enjoy!

tags: people have probably been talking about this all day and this is nothing knew
but i needed to write this down to help get my thoughts in order
we may have have seen eliott just a bit less than we saw even
but i think it feels worse than it actually is bc they keep teasing us with seeing him only to not follow through
first with 'see you monday' when we did not in fact see him on monday - just got a text
and then today when they made actual plans and once again he didn't show up
that combined with the fact that this is the 4th week where the only days we see eliott are thursday or friday
makes it feel like we barely ever see him
it's a weird unnatural decision that imho hurts the pacing of the story and the story itself 🤷
this is why as much as i usually enjoy reading bts stuff i would've preferred if they waited until the end of the season to share them
i don't need you to tell me while it's still happening how the characters are feeling and why they're doing what they're doing
let the fans think for themselves; let them overanalyze and guess and speculate and theorize
let them get things right and get things wrong and not understand things till 3 eps from now and not know and be frustrated at not knowing
trust yourself. trust your actors. trust the story you've written to do the work for you!
rereading this and idk if it makes much sense but w/e
i just know i want to see eliott again and for them to stop teasing us with eliott 'will he or won't he show'
summary: my problem with eliott not showing up to their meeting today is that storytelling-wise, it doesn’t make much sense.  eliott and...
body:
my problem with eliott not showing up to their meeting today is that storytelling-wise, it doesn’t make much sense. 

eliott and lucas had a lovely time together on friday, during which eliott made his intentions towards lucas pretty clear - ‘my relationship with my gf is coming to an end. i want another relationship, not necessarily with a girl’ *stares at lucas* *wink wink nudge nudge*. they almost ended the night with a kiss, and they both know it. then earlier this week, eliott sounded really excited about meeting with lucas to paint the mural. but now……he doesn’t show up? doesn’t even answer lucas’ texts? why??? there’s no apparent reason to explain this, nothing we’ve learned about eliott so far, nothing he’s *said* so far, has prepared us for a possibility where he’d second guess himself and skip their meeting. which is why having eliott state his intentions so clearly on friday, as amazing and exciting as that was, seems like a bad decision at *this* moment - bc unlike eliott, even showed very strong interest in isak but also made it clear that he couldn’t break up with his gf, so even saying he couldn’t meet up bc he already has plans with his gf, or even acting hot and cold towards isak - that made sense! we *knew* even was for whatever reason conflicted b/w wanting isak and not being able to break up with his gf. but eliott?? he’s basically said he wants to dump his gf and get together with lucas. so why isn’t he??? 

according to david, after a fan asked if it had something to do with eliott’s bipolar disorder, he didn’t show up today bc ‘The possibility to finally find Lucas, brought a storm in him… He’s trying to calm down.’ that makes total sense, it’s a totally valid explanation. but here’s the thing - we’re not supposed to know he’s bipolar???? the ONLY reason fans knew to assume that eliott didn’t show due to feeling nervous and overwhelmed, is due to prior knowledge about *even*, not about eliott himself. without that knowledge, eliott’s behavior doesn’t make sense.

you could say this is like even’s behavior after the locker room scene, which at the time didn’t make sense either, but looking back once we learned he was bipolar - did. but it’s not the same. bc the locker room scene was a Moment, it was a DEFINING moment - there was how even acted before it, and how he acted after it. eliott not showing up for the mural? that’s not a moment. that doesn’t change anything about the story, bc we *know* they’re going to kiss on friday, we *know* they’re gonna have a few days of bliss together. most viewers probably won’t even remember eliott skipping out on lucas 4 episodes from now. 

this would’ve made more sense if eliott had said he couldn’t break up with his gf, if we had more hints about eliott struggling with or being conflicted about getting together with lucas. but we’ve had none. if there’s one thing skamfr have made PERFECTLY clear, and NUMEROUS times, it’s that eliott wants lucas, and he wants him bad. and if the director of the show needs to explain to the fans how this character is feeling and why he’s acting the way he is - that’s bad storytelling.

tags: Stop hating on all the characters damnit
im turning into a skam france blog sorry
summary: It seems to me like people forget that skam isn’t about a hero o villain. The characters in skam are supposed to be so realistic...
body: It seems to me like people forget that skam isn’t about a hero o villain. The characters in skam are supposed to be so realistic that there is no right or wrong in the actions they do. We all love Elliott but we are supposed to be upset that he didn’t show up. We’re grossed out by the guy squad of their way of behaving around girls and with Lucas of how he is using Chloe and lies over and over, but we forgive him because it’s Lucas, c’mon. Manon sure seems annoying on screen when she keeps asking questions over and over about Eliott but we understand that she does it because she cares about Lukas. You’re not supposed to hate or love them, you are supposed to see both sides of them and it’s hard to accept that because Skam is one of the first shows ever to create that sort of character building where they are shown as humans and not a 2D character that are either on the good or bad side.

reblog.comment: It seems to me like people forget that skam isn’t about a hero o villain. The characters in skam are supposed to be so realistic that there is no right or wrong in the actions they do. We all love Elliott but we are supposed to be upset that he didn’t show up. We’re grossed out by the guy squad of their way of behaving around girls and with Lucas of how he is using Chloe and lies over and over, but we forgive him because it’s Lucas, c’mon. Manon sure seems annoying on screen when she keeps asking questions over and over about Eliott but we understand that she does it because she cares about Lukas. You’re not supposed to hate or love them, you are supposed to see both sides of them and it’s hard to accept that because Skam is one of the first shows ever to create that sort of character building where they are shown as humans and not a 2D character that are either on the good or bad side.

trail.content_raw: It seems to me like people forget that skam isn’t about a hero o villain. The characters in skam are supposed to be so realistic that there is no right or wrong in the actions they do. We all love Elliott but we are supposed to be upset that he didn’t show up. We’re grossed out by the guy squad of their way of behaving around girls and with Lucas of how he is using Chloe and lies over and over, but we forgive him because it’s Lucas, c’mon. Manon sure seems annoying on screen when she keeps asking questions over and over about Eliott but we understand that she does it because she cares about Lukas. You’re not supposed to hate or love them, you are supposed to see both sides of them and it’s hard to accept that because Skam is one of the first shows ever to create that sort of character building where they are shown as humans and not a 2D character that are either on the good or bad side.
trail.content: It seems to me like people forget that skam isn’t about a hero o villain. The characters in skam are supposed to be so realistic that there is no right or wrong in the actions they do. We all love Elliott but we are supposed to be upset that he didn’t show up. We’re grossed out by the guy squad of their way of behaving around girls and with Lucas of how he is using Chloe and lies over and over, but we forgive him because it’s Lucas, c’mon. Manon sure seems annoying on screen when she keeps asking questions over and over about Eliott but we understand that she does it because she cares about Lukas. You’re not supposed to hate or love them, you are supposed to see both sides of them and it’s hard to accept that because Skam is one of the first shows ever to create that sort of character building where they are shown as humans and not a 2D character that are either on the good or bad side.

summary: It is officially Valentine’s Day in my timezone! I just want to get sentimental for a bit and say that I am truly happy that I...
body: It is officially Valentine’s Day in my timezone! I just want to get sentimental for a bit and say that I am truly happy that I joined tumblr to share my love and experiences of watching Skam France with you all. Here is to love at first sight, to finding things chelou, to walking each other home and to listening to dubstep because your crush loves it. You are my mecs this Valentine’s Day <333
